data.name: ReadCaseAssignment
data.value: select top(1) REASON_CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, SPD_ID, OFF_ID, OSP_CODE, OSP_DATE, CAS_NO from CKT_ASSIGN_CASE with(readuncommitted) where (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @effectiveDate) and (REASON_CODE = 'RSP') and (@casNo = CAS_NO)
